titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Montana State University (Missoula). School of Forestry Photograph Album 1932-1940
Montana State University (Missoula). School of Forestry Photograph Album
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Teresa Hamann

publicationstmt.publisher: Maureen and Mike Mansfield Library, The University of Montana--Missoula

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid encoded by Donna McCrea 2007

repository.corpname: University of Montana, Mansfield Library, Archives and Special Collections

did.unittitle: Montana State University (Missoula). School of Forestry photograph album
did.abstract: This photo album includes photos of students, instructors, the Forester’s Ball, and the1938 Senior trip to a variety of locales including Plains, Glacier National Park, Nine Mile, Lolo, Custer National Forest, and the Gallatin Forest in Montana as well as a few places in Oregon, Washington, and California.

scopecontent.p: The School of Forestry photo album includes photos of students, instructors, the Forester’s Ball, and the1938 Senior trip to a variety of locales including Plains, Glacier National Park, Nine Mile, Lolo, Custer National Forest, and the Gallatin Forest in Montana as well as a few places in Oregon, Washington, and California.

accessrestrict.p: Researchers must use collection in accordance with the policies of Archives and Special Collections, the Maureen and Mike Mansfield Library, and The University of Montana--Missoula.

userestrict.p: Researchers are responsible for using in accordance with 17 U.S.C. and any other applicable statutes. Copyright not transferred to The University of Montana.

prefercite.p: [Name of document or photograph number], Montana State University (Missoula). School of Forestry Photograph Album, Archives and Special Collections, Maureen and Mike Mansfield Library, The University of Montana-Missoula.

custodhist.p: Chain of ownership of this photo album is unknown.

acqinfo.p: Details concerning the acquisition of this photo album by the Archives are unknown.

relatedmaterial.p: Forestry Kaimins from the School of Forestry, Montana State University (Missoula) include briefer records of senior trips with a selection of the photos included in the journals.This institution also holds RG 48 University of Montana School of Forestry Records, and Mss 718 the Philip Preston Papers, which contain related materials.

controlaccess.p: This collection is indexed under the following headings in the online catalog. Researchers desiring materials about related topics, persons, or places should search the catalog using these headings.

controlaccess.corpname: Montana State University (Missoula). School of Forestry--Students--Photographs
